item.title: Foundries.io raises $3.5 million to fix security and device management for IoT and Edge
item.description: Cambridge, UK, 22nd October 2019: Foundries.io, a leading open IoT platform company, today announces a $3.5M funding round to advance its secure operating system platform. The round is led by Crane Venture Partners, with participation from Backed VC.

item.title: Keeping Edge devices secure from IoT hackers
item.description: Edge devices are now at the frontline of security attacks on manufacturing and enterprise organisations. Hackers are extorting more money out of a wider range of companies and corporations, with the latest estimates being that attacks have increased by 500% in the last year.

item.title: Using your own firmware signing keys with MCUBoot
item.description: Secure firmware over the air (FOTA) updates are a key Zephyr microPlatform feature. This post explains how to use your own firmware signing key pair to secure the boot process on your devices.
